summary: In Madrid, actor Lang is hired by Monsieur Bernard to impersonate a certain Owen for a time. Lang is trained for his role, that is to replace Owen as the diamond pickup controller at General Diamond in London.
cast: Richard Harrison|Adolfo Celi|Margaret Lee|Gérard Tichy|Antonio Casas|Eduardo Fajardo|Andrea Bosic|Livio Lorenzon|Ennio Balbo|Luciano Pigozzi|Mary Arden|George Eastman|Tom Felleghy|Dom Moor|Roberto Dell'Acqua|Artemio Antonini|Bruno Ariè|John Bartha|Angelo Boscariol|Massimo Ciprari|Gilberto Galimberti|Jacques Herlin|Claudio Ruffini|Goffredo Unger
title: Gran golpe al servicio de su majestad británica
